name: Crisis Text Line
description: Crisis Text Line is a free, 24/7 text-based mental health support service connecting people in crisis with trained volunteer counselors through text messages.
fullDescription: Crisis Text Line is a free, 24/7 text-based mental health support service connecting people in crisis with trained volunteer counselors through text messages.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free 24/7 crisis support via text
- Trained volunteer crisis counselors
- Confidential conversations
- Support for anxiety, depression, suicidal thoughts, abuse, and more
- Available in English and Spanish
howToGetIt: Text HOME to 741741 from anywhere in the US. A trained crisis counselor will respond within minutes. Free on all carriers.
